attributes.action: guarantee that no public money will be spent to host the 2018 World Cup
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the bid to host the 2018 World Cup should be fully funded by the Football Association and the clubs of the football leagues and that it is inappropriate for public money to be wasted by the preparation or support of the bid or, if successful, the staging of the competition.
